item.title: B.K. add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I have no special talents. I am only passionately curious." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: B.K. add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: B.K. add a quote by Victor Frankl
item.description: "What is to give light must endure burning." -- Victor Frankl

item.title: B.K. add a quote by Raymond Carver
item.description:
"But I guess even the knights were vessels to someone. Isn't that the way it worked? But then everyone is always a vessel to someone. Isn't that right, Terri? But what I liked about the knights, besides their ladies, was that they had that suit of armor, you know, and they couldn't get hurt very easily. No cars in those days, you know? No drunk teenagers to tear into your ass."
Vassals," Terri said.
What?" Mel said.
Vassals," Terri said. "They were called vassals." -- Raymond Carver

item.title: B.K. add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "There is no perfection only life" -- Milan Kundera
